Driver - Class in Unnamed Package
This class manipulates all the other java files in the folder to simulate a simple model of the Solar System This is a part of the Portfolio required for Year 2
Driver() - Constructor for class Driver
 

F

finishedDrawing() - Method in class SolarSystem
Updates the window to show all objects that have recently been drawn using drawSolarObject() or drawSolarObjectAbout().
